resources.string: University at Buffalo Social Work Reader
News from the University at Buffalo School of Social Work
An article you should look at

Some useful tips:
Swipe left or right to change news feeds, or select a specific news feed from the tab list above.
Get a summary of the current feed or this help by choosing the info icon in the menu.
Long press an article to mark it as a favorite or to share it.

Developed on behalf of the University at Buffalo School of Social Work (http://www.socialwork.buffalo.edu/) by Bexkat Systems LLC (http://www.bexkat.com/).
